title: Freedom & Desire: Men of Magic Book 3
description: He’s gorgeous. He’s a player. She’s not interested. When world renowned magical hacker, Siena, transferred to the London department of Men of Magic, she was excited about spending time with her cousin, Elba. She definitely didn’t expect to be caught up in a conspiracy that would change the world of magic forever.With a set of skills that could be the key to their freedom, Siena has a life altering choice to make. Will she decide to help Elba and her new sexy magical entourage? Or will Hemingway’s cocksure advances push her away as she faces not only the darkest secrets of the magical world, but those lurking in the depths of her own heart.These books are for 18+ and contain language some might find offensive as well as explicit sexual content.
author: Addison Arrowdell
